name: Cargo Delivery
description:
In the game, you become a driver of a car that carries various goods to remote villages,
located in snowy areas. The player's task is to complete various missions.
There are only three types of them - for the delivery of goods, for the collection of fuel and for the collection of fuel with replenishment of fuel in the gas tank.
Each completed mission will bring you game progress. When the progress is full, the game will be considered completed.
You will pass through a difficult, winding road with steep ascents and dangerous descents.
Be careful not to crash your car.



Interesting game missions deserve special attention - they drag you into the game process, evoke a feeling of victory.
The game has a well-designed winter location, it is amazing and takes you completely into the world of snow,
where you can test yourself as the best delivery driver of all time!
Game Features :
1. Nice graphics
2. Interesting game missions
3. Well-designed location
